Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Stainless \Stain"less\, a. Free from stain; immaculate. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
The very care he took to keep his name Stainless, with some was evidence of shame. --Crabbe. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Blameless; spotless; faultless. See {Blameless}. [1913 Webster]
stainless adj : of reputation; "his unsullied name"; "an untarnished reputation" [syn: {unstained}, {unsullied}, {untainted}, {untarnished}]
